code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer doPrepareRequest(RestRequest request, XPackClient client) throws IOException {     // we piggyback verbosity on "human" output     boolean verbose = request.paramAsBoolean("human", true).     EnumSet<XPackInfoRequest.Category> categories = XPackInfoRequest.Category.toSet(request.paramAsStringArray("categories", new String[] { "_all" })).     return channel -> client.prepareInfo().setVerbose(verbose).setCategories(categories).execute(new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
